sudo apt install cloud-image-utils

wget https://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/groovy/current/groovy-server-cloudimg-amd64.img
sudo mv groovy-server-cloudimg-amd64.img /opt/isos/cloud/

sudo mkdir /opt/vms/testing
sudo cp /opt/isos/cloud/groovy-server-cloudimg-amd64.img /opt/vms/media/disk0.qcow2
sudo qemu-img resize /opt/vms/media/disk0.qcow2 25G

cat <<EOF > cloud_init.cfg
#cloud-config
hostname: media
users:
  - name: carl
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    groups: users
    shell: /bin/bash
    lock_passwd: false
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - "ssh-rsa  20191227"
# only cert auth via ssh (console access can still login)
ssh_pwauth: false
disable_root: true
packages:
  - qemu-guest-agent
# restart dhclient to propagate hostname to dhcp
runcmd: 
  - dhclient -r
  - dhclient
# written to /var/log/cloud-init-output.log
final_message: "The system is finally up, after $UPTIME seconds"
EOF

# insert network and cloud config into seed image
sudo cloud-localds -v /opt/vms/media/seed.qcow2 cloud_init.cfg


virt-install \
--name media \
--vcpus 4 \
--memory 8192 \
--noautoconsole \
--graphics vnc,listen=0.0.0.0 \
--disk /opt/vms/media/disk0.qcow2,size=25,format=qcow2 \
--disk /mnt/external/media/disk1.qcow2,size=3072,format=qcow2 \
--autostart \
--os-variant ubuntu20.10 \
--cdrom /opt/vms/media/seed.qcow2 \
--network bridge=br13,model=virtio \
--boot hd
